channel.title: Isinarea help
channel.description: k added minigame. got these errors. im not a noob, i know whats wrong. i jsut need the methad for it. [code] client.java:833: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client if (isInArea(3522, 9720, 3583, 9675)) return true; ^ client.java:834: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client if (isInArea(3546, 3305, 3583, 3264)) return true; ^ client.java:25569: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client if (isInArea(3570, 3302, 3579, 3293)) ^ client.java:25573: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client else if (isInArea(3561, 3292, 3568, 3285 )) ^ client.java:25577: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client else if (isInArea(3553, 3301, 3561, 3294 )) ^ client.java:25581: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client else if (isInArea(3550, 3287, 3557, 3278 )) ^ client.java:25585: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client else if (isInArea(3562, 3279, 3569, 3273 )) ^ client.java:25589: cannot find symbol symbol : method isInArea(int,int,int,int) location: class client else if (isInArea(3571, 3285, 3582, 3278 )) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 8 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Isinarea help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

umm idk. you see thats y its in the “help” section…lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 09:31:04 PM[/size][hr]k i got the code, this is it

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
    if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
    return false;
  }

Read full topic

item.title: Isinarea help
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

are you sure its supposed to be int, int, int, int?

item.title: Isinarea help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

k i added this

public int isInArea(int,int,int,int);

and this

public void isInArea(int,int,int,int) {
}

still didnt work

Read full topic

public void isInArea(int,int,int,int)
some code

}

so its just like… umm public int isInArea(int,int,int,int);
?
